channel.title: Golang on SaiLog
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on SaiLog

item.title: Building a Golang app using REACT
item.description: I want to build NESRM using something other than javascript as the router. I don’t like the file systme router in NextJS and I need speeds closer to Golang or Rust. BUT I see very poor resources in using react as it was meant to be used: a FE framework for an MPA with some other backend I’m going to try to get some experience with this using this tutorial on how to build a chat appliation using go and reactJS.
